languages.text: "Но иногда... это так, сука, тяжело". {n}Скривившись, Соломон устало опускает лицо в ладони.{/n}
"But sometimes... it's so bloody hard." {n}Grimacing, Solomorne wearily drops his head into his hands.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Но иногда... это так, сука, тяжело". {n}Скривившись, Соломон устало опускает лицо в ладони.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "But sometimes... it's so bloody hard." {n}Grimacing, Solomorne wearily drops his head into his hands.{/n}

"But sometimes... it's so bloody hard." {n}Grimacing, Solomorne wearily drops his head into his hands.{/n}

languages.text: « Mais parfois... c'est tellement difficile, » {n}avoue-t-il en grimaçant, puis il laisse sa tête tomber entre ses mains.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But sometimes... it's so bloody hard." {n}Grimacing, Solomorne wearily drops his head into his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mais parfois... c'est tellement difficile, » {n}avoue-t-il en grimaçant, puis il laisse sa tête tomber entre ses mains.{/n}

languages.text: 「ですが…時々、本当にやりきれないほど辛いんです」{n}ソロモーンは顔をしかめて、疲れ切った様子で手の中に顔をうずめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But sometimes... it's so bloody hard." {n}Grimacing, Solomorne wearily drops his head into his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ですが…時々、本当にやりきれないほど辛いんです」{n}ソロモーンは顔をしかめて、疲れ切った様子で手の中に顔をうずめた。{/n}

languages.text: «A veces... es demasiado difícil». {n}Con una mueca, Solomorne apoya la cabeza en las manos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But sometimes... it's so bloody hard." {n}Grimacing, Solomorne wearily drops his head into his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «A veces... es demasiado difícil». {n}Con una mueca, Solomorne apoya la cabeza en las manos.{/n}

languages.text: “但有时候……这一切真的太他妈难了。”{n}索罗蒙的脸扭曲着，疲惫地将头埋在手里。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But sometimes... it's so bloody hard." {n}Grimacing, Solomorne wearily drops his head into his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “但有时候……这一切真的太他妈难了。”{n}索罗蒙的脸扭曲着，疲惫地将头埋在手里。{/n}

languages.text: "Fakat bazen o kadar zor ki." {n}Solomorne, buruşturduğu yüzünü elleriyle kapatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But sometimes... it's so bloody hard." {n}Grimacing, Solomorne wearily drops his head into his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ama bazen o kadar zor ki." {n}Solomorne, buruşturduğu yüzünü elleriyle kapatıyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Aber manchmal ... ist es so verdammt hart." {n}Solomorne verzieht das Gesicht zu einer Grimasse und legt den Kopf in seine Hände.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But sometimes... it's so bloody hard." {n}Grimacing, Solomorne wearily drops his head into his hands.{/n}
